commits.author: Michael McCandless
Michael McCandless
Michael McCandless
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Returns the largest number of documents allowed in a * single segment. * *

Note that this method is a convenience method: it * just calls mergePolicy.getMaxMergeDocs as long as * mergePolicy is an instance of {@link LogMergePolicy}. * Otherwise an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

* * @see #setMaxMergeDocs */ public int getMaxMergeDocs() { return getLogDocMergePolicy().getMaxMergeDocs(); }

commits.author: Michael McCandless

commits.author: Michael McCandless
commits.sourceNew:
/** *

Returns the largest segment (measured by document * count) that may be merged with other segments.

* *

Note that this method is a convenience method: it * just calls mergePolicy.getMaxMergeDocs as long as * mergePolicy is an instance of {@link LogMergePolicy}. * Otherwise an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

* * @see #setMaxMergeDocs */ public int getMaxMergeDocs() { return getLogMergePolicy().getMaxMergeDocs(); }

* * @see #setMaxMergeDocs */ public int getMaxMergeDocs() { return getLogMergePolicy().getMaxMergeDocs(); }
